author: IGN
description:
A few years after its release on PS4, Days Gone is getting the remastered treatment. And what better way to put that PS5 Pro to good use than to dive back into the zombie…errr…freaker motorcycle adventure. 

Days Gone Remastered features three graphics modes on the PS5 Pro, Enhanced, Performance, and Quality. In this gameplay comparison we will take a look at the differences between three modes throughout the first hour of the game. Which mode do you like the best? 

Gameplay captured on a PS5 Pro.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5
title: Days Gone Remastered - PS5 Pro Graphics Comparison

author: IGN
description:
"He’ll Be Here." Check out this latest Andor: Season 2 clip from the Star Wars series. Andor: Season 2 stars Diego Luna, Stellan Skarsgård, Genevieve O’Reilly, Denise Gough, Kyle Soller, Adria Arjona, Alan Tudyk, Faye Marsay, Varada Sethu, Elizabeth Dulau, with Ben Mendelsohn and Forest Whitaker. Andor: Season 2 is streaming now on Disney+.

The second season of Andor takes place as the horizon of war draws near and Cassian becomes a key player in the Rebel Alliance. Everyone will be tested and, as the stakes rise, the betrayals, sacrifices and conflicting agendas will become profound. Rife with political intrigue and danger, the series is a prequel to “Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,” which portrayed a heroic band of rebels who steal the plans to the Empire’s weapon of mass destruction—The Death Star—setting the stage for the events of the original 1977 film. “Andor” sets the clock back five years from the events of “Rogue One” to tell the story of the film’s hero, Cassian Andor, and h
title: Andor: Season 2 - Official 'He’ll Be Here' Clip (2025) Adria Arjona, Joplin Sibtain

author: IGN
description:
Meet boss characters in this latest Double Dragon Revive trailer for the upcoming action beat-em-up game. The new Double Dragon Revive trailer shows characters like Williams, Marcus, Linda, Raymond, and more. Double Dragon Revive will be available on PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam on October 23, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Double Dragon Revive - Official Enemy Character Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Capcom thanked fans for 10 million gamers playing the Resident Evil 4 remake by posting a fun little video. However, some are seeing teases for Resident Evil 9 via a wooden sign in the video. Capcom has already confirmed a new mainline entry is in the works, but it might be a ways off. In other news, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is lighting up the sales charts, with around 500,000 copies sold in 24 hours. That's a great start for a new IP with a weird name, and it could be a huge franchise in the future, with a live-action movie already in the works. And finally, be careful when traveling with your cool—probably expensive—game merch. The TSA confiscated a Call of Duty Monkey Bomb from a passenger's check-in luggage, and reminded the public that replicas of weapons and explosives are not allowed on planes. No, the Monkey Bomb wasn't real, but still, the rules are the rules.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Resident Evil 9 Reportedly Teased in RE4 Video, According to Theory - IGN Daily Fix

Check out the latest Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 trailer to see Mitsuri Kanroji (Swordsmith Village Arc) in action. Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 will be available on PC, PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch on August 5, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #DemonSlayer

author: IGN
description:
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is remixing RPGs with parries and special party member skills. The game has some great tutorials, but getting good at combat requires patience, practice, and some pro tips. This combat guide will give you a closer look at the fundamentals, plus a few specific strategies for particular party members to get your expedition started on the right foot.

0:00 - Intro
0:30 - Dodges, Parries, & Jumps
2:13 - Guns
3:02 - Shields
3:55 - Break Skills
4:48 - Pictos & Lumina
6:18 - Stains (Lune)
7:41 - Stances (Maelle)

#ClairObscur #ClairObscurExpedition33 #Gaming
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Beginner’s Combat Guide

author: IGN
description:
Days Gone Remastered is available now on PS5 (PlayStation 5), and the new content is also available now on PC as Broken Road DLC. Check out the Days Gone Remastered launch trailer for this open-world action adventure game. Face off against the harsh reality of the Farewell Wilderness – still infected by hordes of Freakers, two years after a devastating outbreak.

#DaysGone #DaysGoneRemastered #Gaming
title: Days Gone Remastered - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
It’s an RPG-filled week on Xbox Game Pass, and Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 might just be the standout hit. In this episode of Unlocked, we dive into why this visually stunning, emotionally rich RPG could already be a classic in the making. Michael shares why it’s his Game of the Year pick so far in 2025. From bold storytelling to innovative mechanics, Expedition 33 is a must-play for RPG fans.

For more on the Clair Obscur and Xbox News, make sure to check out IGN's Unlocked on IGN.com and youtube.com/igngames

#IGN #Gaming
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Might Already Be an Instant RPG Classic - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description:
Through the perilous world of Days Gone, you’ll face rival gangs, a bloodthirsty cult, and of course, a whole lot of Freakers. Lots and lots of Freakers. While the gameplay may seem straightforward at first, there are a lot of hidden systems the game doesn’t clearly explain. Fortunately, we've spent enough time with Days Gone to help get you started. So whether you are gearing up for the Days Gone Remaster or just simply playing Days Gone for the first time, here are some beginner tips & skills you should know.

00:00 Intro
00:33 Upgrade your Bike Speed
00:54 Give Leon’s Stash to Copeland
01:17 Lockers Only Hold Purchased Weapons
01:43 Disconnect NERO Site Speakers
02:02 Only Closed Hoods and Trunks Have Loot
02:21 Watch Out For Car Alarms
02:45 Top Off Your Tank
03:09 Walk Your Bike
03:31 Quickly Mount Your Bike
03:43 Avoid Freakers While Riding
04:02 Blind Freakers
04:22 Help People In Need
04:48 Make Them Burn
05:13 When All Else Fails, RUN & HIDE
05:30 Skills to Get First
05:59 Es
title: Days Gone - Tips You Need to Know Before Getting Started

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new Doom: The Dark Ages trailer and join game director Hugo Martin for a deep dive into Doom: The Dark Ages' Cosmic Realm, one of the game's new levels. The trailer also gives us a look at a new twin-bladed enemy called the Cosmic Baron, along with lots of gory new Doom: The Dark Ages gameplay.

Doom: The Dark Ages is the prequel to Doom (2016) and Doom Eternal. In this third installment of the modern Doom series, players will step into the blood-stained boots of the Doom Slayer and take on a dark and sinister medieval war against Hell. 

Doom: The Dark Ages will be released on May 15, 2025 for PS5 (PlayStation 5), Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

#DoomTheDarkAges #Doom #Gaming
title: Doom: The Dark Ages - Official Cosmic Realm Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the new Dune: Awakening trailer for a peek at the story in this upcoming open-world survival MMO developed by Funcom.

The Fremen have vanished, Paul Atreides was never born, Lady Jessica obeyed the Bene Gesserit and gave birth to a girl. Duke Leto Atreides survived the assault on Arrakeen and is now locked in a brutal conflict with the Harkonnen over Arrakis and its precious spice. In Dune: Awakening, you begin as a prisoner sent to Arrakis to uncover the mystery of the Fremen’s disappearance. Following in the footsteps of the mysterious desert tribe, you will learn the true meaning of desert power as you rise from a nameless survivor to becoming an agent of the Atreides or the Harkonnen.

The Dune: Awakening release date is June 10, 2025 for PC with a release date for PS5 (PlayStation 5) and Xbox Series X/S to be announced at a later date.

#DuneAwakening #Dune #Gaming
title: Dune: Awakening - Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
After enduring the unforgiving conditions and hostile lifeforms of a desert planet for nearly 20 hours in Dune: Awakening's closed beta, I’m confident developer Funcom has the foundations of an absolutely stellar survival MMO that makes fantastic use of one of the greatest science fiction worlds ever created – if it can squash all of its bugs (and we don't just mean sandworms). Previewed by Travis Northup

#IGN #Gaming #DuneAwakening
title: Dune: Awakening - Closed Beta Impressions

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3073940/God_Save_Birmingham/

#Gaming #IGN #Games
title: God Save Birmingham - Exclusive Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! In this week's episode, Daemon is joined by Beyond's Max Scoville, Unlocked's Ryan McCaffrey, and IGN's Community Lead, Jada Griffin. The topic: what's the difference between a remake and a remaster? And what games do we think deserve the same remastered treatment that The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion got? We also have last episode's poll results, and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.

#Gaming #Oblivion #IGN
title: 10 Games That Deserve the Oblivion Remaster Treatment - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new Street Fighter 6 Elena gameplay trailer to see the next DLC character in action! Elena is the final character from SF6 Year 2 and arrives on June 5, 2025.

Street Fighter 6 Elena can be purchased individually with Fighter Coins. Owners of the Year 2 Character Pass / Ultimate Pass or Years 1-2 Fighters Edition, will automatically get access to Elena when she releases. Street Fighter 6 is available to play now on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, PS4 (PlayStation 4), and PC (Steam). It's also coming to Nintendo Switch 2.

#StreetFighter #StreetFighter6 #Gaming
title: Street Fighter 6 - Official Elena Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at some new Hunger gameplay in the latest trailer for the upcoming PvPvE first-person horror extraction shooter from the creators of Hell Let Loose.

A sinister plague has befallen war-torn Europe, unleashing unspeakable horrors. Step into the desolate ruins of Napoleonic Europe, also known as the World After the End, and embark on a perilous journey solo, or with allies in pairs or trios. Navigate the dangerous landscape haunted by the Hunger, monstrous beings spawned from the plague's wrath.

Hunger will be released in Early Access in 2025 on PC via Steam and Epic Games Store. It's available to wishlist now.

#Hunger #Gaming #Games
title: Hunger - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer

description:

#IGN #Gaming #Oblivion
title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered - How to Join the Dark Brotherhood

description:
